sentences.sContent: Running along the brook, down to the hatchery, what heavenly joy this was when school was over!
sentences.sContent_eng: Running along the brook, down to the hatchery, what heavenly joy this was when school was over!
sentences.sCn: 放学后，有什么比沿着小溪跑到孵卵处更能给人如在天堂般的快乐！

trans.tranOther: A hatchery is a place where people control the hatching of eggs, especially fish eggs
